metadata.title: CVE-2022-0759 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in all versions of kubeclient up to (but not including)v4.9.3, the Ruby client for Kubernetes REST API, in the way it parsedkubeconfig files. When the kubeconfig file does not configure custom CA toverify certs, kubeclient ends up accepting any certificate (it wronglyreturns VERIFY_NONE). Ruby applications that leverage kubeclient to parsekubeconfig files are susceptible to Man-in-the-middle attacks (MITM).

criterions.comment: ruby-kubeclient package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
